class.name: franka_robot_state_broadcaster/FrankaRobotStateBroadcaster
class.description: The franka state broadcaster publishes the full states of franka robots from ros2_control system.

class.name: franka_robot_state_broadcaster/FrankaRobotModelBroadcaster
class.description: The franka model broadcaster publishes the coriolis, mass, ee body/zero jacobians from ros2_control system.
